[Java] Class TenantHibernateFilterEnabler

java.lang.Object
  TenantHibernateFilterEnabler

@HawkEventConsumer
public class TenantHibernateFilterEnabler

Subscribes itself to hibernate.sessionCreated events. Enables the tenant Hibernate filter with the current tenant id (if any). Important: tenantId = null will disable the Hibernate filter!

Authors:
Kim A. Betti
